record.field: Balance Sheet according to ยง 224 UGB
1. Concessions, industrial property rights and similar rights and benefits, and licenses derived therefrom
1. Land, rights equivalent to land and buildings, including buildings on third-party land
3. Other equipment, factory and office equipment
4. Prepayments made and assets under construction
AAIII1.balance + AAIII2.balance + AAIII3.balance + AAIII4.balance + AAIII5.balance + AAIII6.balance
4. Loans to companies in which participations are held
5. Securities (book-entry securities) held as fixed assets
3. Receivables from companies in which participations are held
IV. Cash on hand, bank balances

V. Liabilities from the acceptance of bills of exchange drawn and the issue of own bills of exchange
VII. Liabilities to companies in which participations are held
of which in the context of social security
of which with a remaining term of up to one year
of which with a remaining term of more than one year
